function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Sustained periods of isolation leading to mental health issues and social disconnection","Impact":"Increased risk of mental health problems, social unrest, and decreased community engagement","Mitigation":"Regular mental health check-ins, access to virtual social activities, and community support programs","Technologies":"Telemedicine, virtual support groups, and community engagement platforms","People":"Individuals in isolation, vulnerable populations, and communities at large","Owner":"Healthcare providers, community organizations, and local government"},{"Description":"Urban inequities leading to differential exposure to unhealthy conditions","Impact":"Increased health disparities, economic inequality, and social unrest","Mitigation":"Equitable access to health and safety resources, fair labor practices, and support for vulnerable workers","Technologies":"Public health outreach, workplace safety technology, and fair labor monitoring systems","People":"Manual laborers, service industry workers, and economically disadvantaged communities","Owner":"Employers, government agencies, and community organizations"},{"Description":"Loss of trust in professional expertise and accountability systems","Impact":"Decreased confidence in building environmental assessments, potential exploitation of loopholes, and reduced public demand for sustainable buildings","Mitigation":"Rebuilding trust through transparent practices, ethical guidelines, and independent oversight","Technologies":"Data transparency platforms, ethical compliance monitoring tools, and independent auditing systems","People":"Architects, building professionals, and regulatory agencies","Owner":"Professional associations, regulatory bodies, and industry stakeholders"}]}
